single_lever.description: reuse one graph snapshot for expected-graph comparison in conformance fixture evaluation
single_lever.hotspot_context: run_fixture expected graph comparison called snapshot twice per fixture before this change

profile_command: rch exec -- cargo test -p fnx-conformance --test smoke packet_009_differential_metamorphic_and_adversarial_taxonomy_is_deterministic -- --exact --nocapture

baseline.notes: rch remote command duration before lever

candidate.notes: rch remote command duration after lever

behavior_isomorphism_checks.command: rch exec -- cargo test -p fnx-conformance --test smoke packet_009_differential_metamorphic_and_adversarial_taxonomy_is_deterministic -- --exact --nocapture
behavior_isomorphism_checks.purpose: packet-009 differential/metamorphic/adversarial behavior contract remains unchanged

risk_notes: optimization only reduces duplicate snapshot allocation; comparison semantics unchanged
measurement is command-level and includes harness overhead; treat as directional for this lever

rollback.trigger: rollback if packet-009 hotspot command regresses by >5% for 2 consecutive runs

decision_contract.loss_model: parity regression cost dominates speedup benefit
